1.title: A Runaway Cow

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Pat's special mission is to deliver a new cow to Alf, but this cow has a habit of running away. It causes chaos in Pencaster and gets stuck on a ledge on Greendale Crag. Pat's delivery mission turns into an exciting rescue.

2.title: A Teepee

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Pat must deliver the 1st prize in the annual Greendale treasure hunt, a tepee, and only Lauren knows the secret location. But when Pat loses Lauren's letter he must take part in the treasure hunt himself in order to find her.

3.title: A Wind Machine

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: On a very windy day, Pat has to deliver a wind generator to Ted Glen.

4.title: Crazy Robots

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Postman Pat has to deliver two robots to help sort post at the sorting office, but they escape and cause chaos.

6.title: A Bouncy Castle

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Pat's mission is to deliver a bouncy castle to Lauren's class. The castle is impossible to deliver as it inflates inside the post office. Pat delivers the bouncy castle by helicopter but once delivered Jess gets his claws stuck in the castle and it bursts. Pat remembers that Michael ordered hundreds of sticky plasters for his mobile shop and uses them to cover the holes.

7.title: Charlie's Telescope

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Postman Pat has a telescope to deliver to Charlie Pringle, but can he get it there in time for Charlie to see the comet?

8.title: Fruit Bats

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Pat has to deliver some sleeping fruit bats, but they are woken up by one of Ted Glen's inventions and fly away.

10.title: Naughty Pumpkin

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Lizzy and Lauren have arranged a surprise horse riding lesson for Ben. When Amy receives an emergency call out, Pat is called upon to bring Pumpkin to the mail centre. Pumpkin is being a very naughty pony and when he manages to escape, Pat needs to stop him from ransacking Pencaster Market and bring him back in time for Ben's surprise.

11.title: A Movie Feast

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Postman Pat has to deliver all the equipment for an open-air movie in Pencaster Square, but the film reel falls out of the back of his post van.

13.title: A Wobbly Piano

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Pat needs to deliver a piano for Lizzy's first ever concert. The problem is that the piano has wheels, and it's as if it has a mind of its own. It slips and slides, rolls down the hills and looks like it is never going to be delivered. With Pumpkin's help, Pat makes it just in time for the concert.

15.title: A Magical Jewel

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: A Teddy

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: Super Magnet

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

17.plot: When the water tower falls across the train tracks at the station halt, it's Pat's job to pick it up using his helicopter and a giant super magnet. The Magnet soon starts attracting objects - Alf's spade, PC Selby's hat, Pumpkin's bridle, from all over Pencaster and Greendale. A chase ensues as Amy, Alf and PC Selby race to get their metal objects back from Pat. Pat needs to save the day and lift the water tower off the tracks before the Pencaster Flyer comes into the station...

18.title: Treehouse

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

18.plot: Amy's new hibernation home is not fit for purpose, but an accident results in it being used for the children's new clubhouse anyway.

19.title: Green Rabbit

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

19.plot: Pumpkin the horse runs off with Pat's special delivery. Will Nikhil Bains ever get his new green rabbit toy?

20.title: A Surprise

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

20.plot: Ben has organised a special surprise party for Postman Pat where he plans to award him a gold star for being the best Postman and always delivering on time! Ben sends Pat off to pick up a Special Delivery from Greendale Post Office so they can decorate, but when Ben needs more time he has to find a way to delay Pat's journey. No road block or hay bales will stop Pat as the Special Delivery always gets through!

23.title: Disco Machine

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

23.plot: Pat has to deliver a disco machine to the school in time for the disco that evening. While the children wait excitedly, the disco machine is damaged in an accident and Pat has to take the machine to Ted for repair. To make matters worse, the bridge to Greendale is closed at the last minute and it's up to Pat to find a way to the school in time to save the disco.

24.title: Giant Cake

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

24.plot: Pat has to deliver a giant cake for PC Selby to jump out of to cheer up Lucy Selby, but things don't go to plan.

25.title: Ice Skates

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

25.plot: On the snowiest day of the year Pat has to deliver a pair of ice skates to Meera - but the snow falls so quickly that he gets trapped inside the sorting office with Ben and Jess. With the roads all blocked and more snow falling, Pat needs to find a way to get through the snow and deliver the skates to Meera.

26.title: The Flying Christmas Stocking

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

26.plot: Pat has to deliver Christmas presents in a stocking using his helicopter. Unfortunately, the stocking splits and presents are dropped all over Greendale.

3.title: Postman Pat and the Cheeky Sheep

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Pat has to deliver a sheep to Amy, but the naughty animal breaks loose and mixes in with a flock of Alf's sheep. Together, the wayward animals head for Pencaster Market.

7.title: Postman Pat and the Identical Cats

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Doctor Gilbertson has a 'visitor' arriving in the afternoon - her sister's cat called Bess! And Bess looks rather similar to Jess!... Meow! Pat and Juluian have promised to get Bess to Doctor Gilberston. Double Meow! Poor Jess - Julian seems to like Bess more than him! And when Bess escapes a series of chases and misunderstandings make Julian realise how much he loves his good old friend Jess after all.

8.title: Postman Pat and the Station Window

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: The Train Station in Pencaster is getting a brand new stained glass window - but, um, the locals think that the new 'modern art' window isn't all that great.. Pat's job is to deliver it but when it gets a dangerous crack in it during the journey Ajay says he can't accept the delivery. It's a Special Delivery: Mission Not Accomplished! Oh dear! Pat knows exactly who to ask for help and the children of Greendale School find their gorgeious mosaic picture of Greendale comes in very handy.

9.title: Postman Pat and the Sculpture Trail

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: There is a sculpture trail talking place in Greendale, but when Rosie the naughty goat starts eating the sculptures, Pat has to work fast to put everything right before the judging starts.

10.title: Postman Pat and Meera's Gecko

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Meera's expecting a Gecko to arrive and has got his lovely tank all ready and cosy to greet her new pet called George. Pat's collected him and is on his way - but the gecko has escaped and now everyone's looking all over Greendale for the little chap...

11.title: Postman Pat and the Booming Bagpipes

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Mrs Goggins is really missing her home town in Scotland. A postcard from her sister hints that a gift's on its way and she's really looking forward to receiving it. Pat collects it at the sorting office - paaaarp, boooomph!! What's that?! Jess nearly jumps out of his black and white skin. Don't panic, it's just a set of BAGPIPES! On the way to deliver them to Mrs Goggins the bagpipes come in rather useful..

12.title: Postman Pat and the Scarecrow

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Poor old Alf - he's planted a big garden full of juicy raspberries and the naughty birds are busy noshing them all!!. Time for a scarecrow which happily has just arrived at Pencaster Sorting Office. Funny thing, though, it's the spitting image of PC Selby! - well, if a policeman can't scare away the birds what can?!

13.title: Postman Pat and the Seaside Special

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Toot Toot! It's the ''Seaside Special'' (the beautiful bright green Greendale Flyer), stoking it's engines ready for a trip to the seaside!. Julian is so excited and is packing buckets, spades, kites and a pic-nic ready for the fun day out. Dad, Postman Pat and his mum Sarah are all ready to go but no! An urgent call from Ben stops Pat. Will he make it to the train in time for their day at the seaside.

14.title: Postman Pat and the Chinese Dragon

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: It's 'Chinese Day' at school and the children are really looking forward to a day of special chinese themed celebration, helped by Michael. As a special surprise Michael has ordered a real Chinese Dragon costume which Pat picks up at the sorting office to deliver to the school. On the way tho', naughty horse Pumpkin gets the dragon's head stuck on his own and as he canters off into the fields the locals are terrified that there's a REAL dragon on the lose..

16.title: Postman Pat and the Didgeridoo

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

16.plot: Postman Pat has to deliver a didgeridoo to the school and helps find their pet hamster, Dottie.

17.title: Postman Pat and the Amazing Weather Machine

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

17.plot: Ted Glen's weather machine causes chaos around Greendale, but saves the Greendale Show which is being ruined by a heatwave.

18.title: Postman Pat and the Super Skateboard Sizzle

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

18.plot: When Postman Pat's van runs out of charge, he has to complete his special delivery on a skateboard.

19.title: Postman Pat and the Rubber Duck Race

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

19.plot: Postman Pat drops his special delivery of rubber ducks into the river and Ajay mistakes them for real ducks.

20.title: Postman Pat and the Sticky Situation

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

20.plot: Pat has to deliver a quad bike to Thompson Ground for Alf's birthday. On his way, he saves one of Alf's sheep who has gotten stuck in the mud.

21.title: Postman Pat and the Tricky Tracker

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

21.plot: Alf's homing pigeon Cedric is taking part in a big race today and Pat has to deliver a special 'tracking device' for Alf to attach to Cedric. Time is short so Pat's in a hurry - so much so that he doesn't notice a naughty magpie steeling the shiny tracker from his van. Pat tries to track it down but only finally with the help of the local children who are using a flying camera to take pictures of the local area does he manage to get the tracker back and deliver it to Alf. Just in the nick of time!

22.title: Postman Pat and the Greendale Ukulele Big Band

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

22.plot: Pat is delivering a big box of lovely Ukeleles for Reverend Timms ''Ukelele Big Band.'' Everyone's getting one and as Pat delivers them he finds out that they all have a little problem they need help with - happily Pat CAN help - whether it's tuning or plucking or keeping in time.. Reverend Timms is overjoyed as they all arrive playing a wonderful tune for him - and the children have a special treat for everyone as they play a song they've composed themselves.

23.title: Postman Pat and the Tremendous Tree

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

23.plot: Pat has a very unusual delivery today - an ENORMOUS tree which Alf has ordered for Thompson Ground. Very tricky indeed to transport Pat has strapped it into the 4x4 and is driving very slowly. Jess is worried about the little birds nest Pat has not noticed in the tree - it's full of baby birds! Will Pat be able to deliver the tree including the baby birds intact?

24.title: Postman Pat and the Great Greendale Website

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

24.plot: Pat's mission today is to collect donations towards the brand new Greendale Website. There's lots and lots to do and all kinds of obstacles for Pat along the way.. it's a long day for Pat - but he's rewarded when the Website goes live and as a special present the children have prepared a special tribute to Pat.

25.title: Postman Pat and the Twinkly Lights

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

25.plot: It's Diwali. Nisha is trying to decorate the café with special fairy lights to celebrate this 'festival of lights'. Pat delivers them first thing! But distaster - the lights break straight away - they're not working.. and they realise that the electricity in the café is also broken.. finally as the snow falls down Pat makes it up to the old Post Office in the hills to get the old lights out, hangs them all across the valley - and turns them on - Nisha is delighted, the most beautiful festival of lights she could ever have wished for!

26.title: Postman Pat and the Christmas Panto Horse

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

26.plot: It's Christmas! And everyone's getting ready for the pantomime. Little Lucy has a wonderful song to sing at the centre of the show but when she goes missing whilst out riding on Pumpkin the horse all that matters is to find her..

15.title: Pat's Special Delivery: A Magical Jewel

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

15.plot: Pat has to deliver a very old and special elephant statue to Meera for show-and-tell. Unfortunately, a magpie is drawn to the shiny jewel embedded in the elephant.

16.title: Pat's Special Delivery: A Teddy

episode of.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service (TV Series 2008– )

16.plot: On the day of a teddy bear's picnic, Pat accidentally delivers a teddy to Rosie the goat and a bell to Nikhil Bains and has to correct his mistake which is not as easy as it seems.

imdb.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
plot: For over 27 years, Postman Pat has delivered enchanting entertainment to the delight of young children around the world. In his latest series Postman Pat Special Delivery Service(SDS) everyone's favourite postman delivers more than ever!
